thread.title: Scott R
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses USA reviewed by Scott R

author: Scott R
title: Scott R
text: Needed frames for my perscription - found a great pair from the sites massive inventory - prices was not cheap but def a deal and in line will my expectation for a name brand - delivery was within two days - frames are quality and i am very happy with purchase - I am already looking for another pair - i am a fan and i recommend
